member.name: IDWriteFontFileStream.GetFileSize
member.summary: Obtains the total size of a file.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the total size of the file.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontFileStream.GetLastWriteTime
member.summary: Obtains the last modified time of the file.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the last modified time of the file in the format that represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals since January 1, 1601 (UTC).
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontFileStream.ReadFileFragment
member.summary: Reads a fragment from a font file.
member.param: When this method returns, contains an address of a pointer to the start of the font file fragment. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
The offset of the fragment, in bytes, from the beginning of the font file.
The size of the file fragment, in bytes.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to a pointer to the client-defined context to be passed to .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontFileStream.ReleaseFileFragment
member.summary: Releases a fragment from a file.
member.param: A pointer to the client-defined context of a font fragment returned from .

member.name: IDWriteFontFileStream
member.summary: Loads font file data from a custom font file loader.
